title: WCAS MATH 290-3-43 MENU: Linear Algebra and Multivariable Calculus

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Continuation of MENU 290-2. Multivariable integral calculus. Vector analysis. Students may not receive credit for both 240 and 290-1; 230 and 290-2; or 234 and 290-3. Prerequisites: one year of calculus (usually in high school) and consent of the department.

THIS COURSE HAS MANDATORY EVENING MIDTERM EXAMINATIONS AT 6PM ON APRIL 28 AND MAY 19. PLEASE CHECK THE REGISTRAR'S WEBPAGE FOR DETAILS: http://www.registrar.northwestern.edu/registration/midterms.html

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: One year of calculus (usually in high school) and consent of department and MENU program.

descriptions.name: Class Notes
descriptions.value: Students may not receive credit for both 240 and 290-1, for both 230 and 290-2, or for both 234 and 290-3.

subject: MATH
